title: Espace Louis Vuitton München
body: Rineke Dijkstra 'The Krazy House' From May 3rd to September 14th, 2024, the Espace Louis Vuitton München unveils 'The Krazy House' exhibition by Dutch artist Rineke Dijkstra.

title: Espace Louis Vuitton Seoul
body: Sheila Hicks 'Atterrissage' From April 30th to September 8th, 2024, the Espace Louis Vuitton Seoul proudly presents its sixth exhibition 'Atterrissage' by American artist Sheila Hicks.

title: Espace Louis Vuitton Venezia
body: Ernest Pignon-Ernest 'Je Est Un Autre' For the 60th International Art Exhibition — La Biennale di Venezia, the Fondation Louis Vuitton has invited French artist Ernest Pignon-Ernest to present 'Je Est Un Autre,' a unique exhibition created especially for the Espace Louis Vuitton Venezia from April 20th to November 24th, 2024.

title: Espace Louis Vuitton Osaka
body: Isaac Julien 'Ten Thousand Waves' For its fifth show, Espace Louis Vuitton Osaka unveils a new exhibition from March 27th to September 22nd, 2024, by British artist Isaac Julien, as part of the 'Hors-les-murs' program.

title: Espace Louis Vuitton
body: Espace Louis Vuitton is an exhibition space that encourages new contemporary artistic creation – its locations are found in the heart of major cities.

title: The Malle Courrier Exhibition
body: From May 23, 2023, Louis Vuitton presents The Malle Courrier exhibition, a veritable ode to the Maison's trunk-making heritage.

title: Louis Vuitton unveils a pop-up bookstore at the 26th Paris Photo at the Grand Palais Éphémère from November 9th to 12th, 2023.
body: Paris Photo x Louis Vuitton Publishing

title: Espace Louis Vuitton Venezia
body: French artist Fabrice Hyber began his artistic career in the 1980s, exploring the boundaries between art and science. His work focuses on love, the body and nature. Questioning the ecological threats facing the world, Hyber created an in-situ installation around the tree trunks on which the foundations of Venice rest. This reforestation process brings to life an invisible forest, which would have continued to grow through the city's glass - right in the heart of the Espace Louis Vuitton Venezia.

title: 'Nóng Hó, Shanghai' Pop-Up Space at Suzhou Creek
body: From October 12th to November 12th, 2023, Louis Vuitton presents an exclusive pop-up space at the Fotografiska Shanghai.

title: Fondation Louis Vuitton
body: From October 18th, 2023, to April 2nd, 2024, the Fondation Louis Vuitton unveils the first retrospective in France dedicated to Mark Rothko (1903-1970) in 24 years.
